author: legomaniac
title: Big towel for LEGO pieces
review:
A big 59 by 29 inch towel with LEGO logo and different color minifigures printed on it. I don't plan on using it as a bath towel, but to pour some bricks on for a quick build or sorting pieces.  It is only printed on one side and the fabric seems a bit thin for a bath towel.

Has a fabric hook on top of the towel by the logo and on one side to hang the towel on a hook.

Pros

  • Big 59" long 29" wide
  • Colorful, love the artwork



Cons

  • Seems a bit thin. I wouldn't use it heavily.

This towel will go great in any LEGO themed room. I find it is more suitable for a beach towel or to pour your LEGO bricks on and pick up the towel for easy cleanup.
